message.content:
cs.DL, cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.AI 

The paper discusses a bibliometric methodology for evaluating research performance at the individual, group, and department levels within research institutions. This methodology is applied to the hard science disciplines of the Italian university research system. The paper does not focus on a specific area of computer science, but rather proposes a methodology that could be applied across disciplines. Therefore, likely arXiv CS sub-categories include cs.DL (Digital Libraries), cs.CY (Computers and Society), cs.CR (Cryptography and Security), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
